title: Map Number to Range (Challenge)
description: In programming, we often need to map a number from one range to another range. For example, we may have a number that ranges from 0 to 10, but we need to map it to a range of 0 to 100. This can be useful in many applications, such as scaling data or converting units.

meta.title: Map Number to Range Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that maps a number from one range to another range.
meta.keywords: python, number mapping, range conversion, data scaling, programming
